oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 5th Avenue Looking South Near Downtown, 1958
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of 5th Avenue North, looking south near downtown Nashville. The Cordell Hull building, State Capitol, and Life and Casualty Tower are visible in the background. Photographed by John Acuff of the Nashville Housing Authority, 20 May 1958. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
